content:
It's a great idea to take a diving course before going to Tubbataha Reef, especially if you're new to diving. Scuba diving can be a challenging physical activity and requires proper training to ensure safety and enjoyment underwater. The liveaboard companies offering diving courses for beginners will help you develop the necessary skills and knowledge to dive safely and comfortably, and to fully appreciate the underwater world.

Even if you're an experienced diver, it's recommended to take refresher courses or have a diving session with a dive master to assess your skills and proficiency level.

Moreover, Tubbataha Reef is an advanced diving destination that features strong currents and deep dives, so it's best to have some diving experience before embarking on a diving trip. Liveaboard companies have different diving level requirements for divers joining their trips, so make sure to check their policies and requirements before booking.
